meanings.sent1: She got a new book for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: He got a present from his friend.
meanings.sent3: The cat got a surprise gift from the owner.
meanings.sent4: The student got a flood of compliments after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The team got a boost of confidence after the win.

meanings.sent2: They got a big house in the city.
meanings.sent3: The dog got a shiny new collar.
meanings.sent4: The garden got a variety of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The child got a favorite toy for Christmas.

meanings.sent1: She finally got the math problem.
meanings.sent2: He got the concept after studying for hours.
meanings.sent3: The robot got the joke and laughed.
meanings.sent4: The detective got the clue and solved the case.
meanings.sent5: The student got the lesson after asking questions.

meanings.definition: To arrive or reach a destination
meanings.sent1: They got to the park early.
meanings.sent2: She got home before it started raining.
meanings.sent3: The bus got to the stop on time.
meanings.sent4: The package got to the customer quickly.
meanings.sent5: He got to the airport just in time for his flight.
